indicator_name: Number of countries that adopt and implement investment promotion regimes for least developed countries

page_content: No data was sourced for this indicator**Non-statistical indicator** This is not a statistical indicator. However, we will collaborate with the policy lead in the UK so that we are able to link to the relevant legislative framework.

data_notice_text: This indicator was revised following indicator changes from the United Nations 2020 Comprehensive Review.
